titles.title: A resolution condemning the People's Republic of China's use of military aggression to change the status quo at the Line of Actual Control between India and China.
A resolution condemning the People's Republic of China's use of military aggression to change the status quo at the Line of Actual Control between India and China.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns China's use of military force at the Line of Actual Control (i.e., the effective border between India and China) and supports a diplomatic solution that restores the line's demarcation in accordance with China's previous agreement with India. The resolution also commends India's efforts to secure its telecommunications infrastructure from Chinese security threats and expresses support for a strengthened U.S. partnership with India.
